com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh

Class RectangleBatchGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.Geometry
      • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.RectangleBatchGeometry

  • public class RectangleBatchGeometry
extends Geometry
    This class defines the geometry of the mesh used to render a batch of rectangles.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Detail

      • RectangleBatchGeometry

        public RectangleBatchGeometry(int batchCapacity,
                      boolean usesColors,
                      boolean usesTexturesUV)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        batchCapacity - Max number of elements of the batch.
        usesColors - true if the geometry stores colors, false otherwise.
        usesTexturesUV - true if the geometry stores texture coordinates, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • updateMVPMatrix

        public void updateMVPMatrix(int batchIndex,
                   Vector2 position,
                   Vector2 scale,
                   float rotation,
                   Camera camera)
        Transforms the MVP matrix located at the specified index with the especified position, scale and rotation.
        Parameters:
        batchIndex - Index of the array of MVP matrices where the matrix is located.
        position - Position.
        scale - Scale.
        rotation - Rotation angle around the origin.
        camera - Camera.

      • getMvpIndices

        public float[] getMvpIndices()
        Returns the array of indices of the array of MVP matrices.
        Returns:
        Array of indices of the array of MVP matrices.

      • setMvpIndices

        public void setMvpIndices(float[] mvpIndices)
        Sets the array of indices of the array of MVP matrices.
        Parameters:
        mvpIndices - New array of indices.

      • getMvpMatrices

        public float[] getMvpMatrices()
        Returns the array of MVP matrices. All matrices are stored in the same array. Each block of 16 numbers is a 4x4 matrix.
        Returns:
        Array of MVP matrices
